content: The Xiang River Goddess Gourd is a Legendary Gourd in Black Myth: Wukong, located in The Webbed Hollow. It is one of the Gourds in the game that has the most uses by default: 8 to be exact. Unfortunately, it can't be upgraded beyond this at the Shen Monkey Vendor, but it is still incredibly strong late in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Xiang_River_Goddess_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Xiang River Goddess Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
The Xiang River Goddess Gourd is a Legendary Gourd in Black Myth: Wukong, located in The Webbed Hollow. It is one of the Gourds in the game that has the most uses by default: 8 to be exact. Unfortunately, it can't be upgraded beyond this at the Shen Monkey Vendor, but it is still incredibly strong late in the game.
